timeline.message:
Standardize script field's rejection error

This standardizes the exception type thrown when attempting to build a
query on a script field that it doesn't support. It also replaces the
field type `[script]` in the error message with whatever the runtime type
is.

timeline.bodyText: To be more accurate, the field is of type script and its runtime_type is keyword, long etc. Can we expand and say it is a script field with runtime_type etc. ?
timeline.author: javanna
